summary: This is a service request log from August 2019 for the installation of a Nice Vision system at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, where Jeffrey Epstein was held. It documents technical personnel working on security camera systems at the facility shortly before Epstein's death.

keyFacts: This service request documents work on security camera systems at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York in August 2019.
The work involved installing a new Nice Vision system with 4 SVRs, 1 decoder, and 12 NVE2016 encoders, with approximately 110 of 161 cameras named correctly at the time of the log.
Approximately 20 cameras were reported as 'out' (not functioning) during the installation.
The timing of this service request (August 2019) coincides with Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration at MCC New York before his death on August 10, 2019.
The document shows ongoing maintenance and installation of security systems at the facility where Epstein was held.
